# Using a Remote Release

A remote release can be used for long time-exposures. When using an optional RR-100 remote release or an electronic release from third-party suppliers, connect it to the cameraâ€™s remote release connector.

!Remote Release Connection

A confirmation dialog will be displayed when a remote release is connected; press **MENU/OK** and select **REMOTE** for **MIC/REMOTE RELEASE**.

!Confirmation Dialog
